source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an aerial view of a city riverfront on a sunny day. A large drawbridge with several military tanks on it spans the water. In the background, modern buildings line the river, and a large splash is visible near the bank.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an aerial view of a city riverfront on a sunny day. A large drawbridge with several military tanks on it spans the water. In the background, modern buildings line the river, and a large splash is visible near the bank.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several pedestrians are walking across the bridge alongside the military tanks, as this detail provides additional context about the subject's motion and interactions.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is an aerial view of a city riverfront on a sunny day. A large drawbridge with several military tanks and pedestrians walking alongside them spans the water. In the background, modern buildings line the river, and a large splash is visible near the bank.
